entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who pulled out a long thin box containing a brand-new wand. He also participated in the conversation with Harry and Hermione about their books.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who asked Ron and Hermione about their books. He is also referred to as Muggle-born.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who has three bulging bags of new subjects including Arithmancy, Care of Magical Creatures, Divination, Study of Ancient Runes, and Muggle Studies.

entities.name: monsters books
entities.description: The Monster Books are mentioned as the ones that the assistant nearly cried when Ron and Harry said they wanted two.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are friends, as evidenced by their conversation about books.
